attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Television License Fee is an absolute scandal.....with the growing number of Television channels appearing on our TV's.....most of them now with a subsciption fee....One example is Sky....to view the newest films....football...and most other sports now....the license people cannot justify the extortionate fees for the television licenese....All we get is repeat after repeat.....of the same old rubbish....day in and day out......it is is time the People stood firm and said ...NO MORE !!!!....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
